title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When trying to select an item in the library outline view, it is not possible to select it on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.

Expected behavior: The selected item should be highlighted and remain selected.

Observed behavior: When attempting to select an item, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view instead of selecting the desired item.
